conclusion: When the rod is not energized, it is in equilibrium under the influence of gravity and tension in the wires.

conclusion: When the rod is energized: Weight of the rod: mg downward, Tension in each wire: 1/4 T upward, Magnetic force: FB upward.

premise: With the new tension 1/4 T in each wire: 2(1/4 T) + FB = mg
